name: A grand voidtouched greatcloak
data: It increases the users strength impressively.
It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It decreases the users charisma colossally.
It has low armour class for its type (average in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration unbelievably much.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration unbelievably much.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance superbly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
